name: nc-games-sql
description: A RESTful API with a PostgreSQL database.

scripts.docker:build: docker build . -t dentednerd/ncgames-api && docker compose up
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker compose down -v && docker image prune --force --filter='label=dentednerd/ncgames-api' && docker build . -t dentednerd/ncgames-api && docker compose up
